participant_1.background:
I have several different breeds of pets.
I am always looking for wildlife when i am outside.
I enjoy watching animal videos on the internet.
I visit animal shelters fairly often.

participant_2.background:
I have two cats.
My cats like to be read to.
I like to read books.
I am a librarian in my current job.
I like to eat tune.

content.text: I'm so excited to meet you! I'm a big animal lover, and I've always wanted to talk to someone who works with animals.
It's nice to meet you too! I love working with animals, and I'm happy to answer any questions you have.
It's hard to choose just one, but I think I would have to say cats.
Me too! I have two cats of my own.
That's great! What are their names?
Their names are Mittens and Snowball.
Those are both great names. I love it when people give their pets unique names.
Me too! I think it's important to give your pets names that reflect their personalities.
I agree. I think it's also important to make sure that your pets are well-cared for.
I definitely agree with that. I love my cats very much, and I make sure they have everything they need to be happy and healthy.
That's great to hear. I'm sure your cats are very lucky to have you.
Thanks! I think they are too.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to go hiking and camping. I also enjoy reading books and watching movies.
Those sound like great hobbies. I love hiking and camping too. I also enjoy reading books and watching movies.
That's great! We should go hiking together sometime.
